data.actual_result: The beginning of the URL is going to the left but the rest of the URL isn't appearing.
data.expected_result: The rest of the URL is supposed to appear.
data.short_description: Scrolling to the right of an URL container does not work.
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to a server's settings in "Widget" or "Webhooks". - Scroll to the right of an URL container to reveal the rest of the URL.
